steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Mailings' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Start Mail Merge' group, click on the 'Start Mail Merge' button.
In the 'Label Options' dialog box, choose the label type and size you want to use.
Click on the 'OK' button to apply the label options.
In the 'Write & Insert Fields' group, click on the 'Address Block' button.
In the 'Insert Address Block' dialog box, customize the address block format if needed.
Click on the 'OK' button to insert the address block.
In the 'Write & Insert Fields' group, click on the 'Preview Results' button to preview the labels.
Make any necessary adjustments to the labels if needed.
Click on the 'Finish & Merge' button in the 'Finish' group.
Select 'Edit Individual Documents' from the drop-down menu.
In the 'Merge to New Document' dialog box, choose the options for merging the labels.
Click on the 'OK' button to merge the labels into a new document.
Save the merged document with a desired name and location.
